briefdescription.para: Number of favorite slots for parameter storage.

Selects the previous amplitude modulation slot.

Clears the current favorite slot.

Increments the fine frequency adjustment.

Increases the output level.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the LVGL display with current parameters.
